title: Lachlan Morton completes Tour Divide route in 12 days, 12 hours, and 21 minutes
content:
The EF Education-EasyPost star overcomes trench foot, freezing rain, wildfire detours mental demons and a busted derailleur to lay down a blistering time on the storied ultra-bikepacking route.

Read the full article at Lachlan Morton completes Tour Divide route in 12 days, 12 hours, and 21 minutes on Velo.
author: Betsy Welch
